TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SoapMessageStage extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 SOAP 訊息的處理階段。

span.span: Specifies the processing stage of a SOAP message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供擴充性機制，可呼叫使用 SOAP 的 Web 服務。ASP.NET provides an extensibility mechanism for calling Web Services using SOAP. 擴充性機制為中心，以便檢查或修改用戶端或伺服器上處理的訊息中的特定階段的訊息。The extensibility mechanism revolves around a that can inspect or modify a message at specific stages in message processing on either the client or the server. 此列舉指定的處理階段。This enumeration specifies the processing stage of the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是片段的 SOAP 擴充功能，它會實作方法。The following code example is a fragment of a SOAP extension, which implements the method. 內方法、 處理處理特定。Within the method, processing of a is handled specific to the . [!code-cpp[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/CPP/SoapMessageState.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/CS/soapmessagestate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapMessageState#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapMessageState/VB/soapmessagestate.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage AfterDeserialize = int32(8)

summary.span: 緊接在 之後的階段會從 SOAP 訊息還原序列化為物件。

span.span: The stage just after a is deserialized from a SOAP message into an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間之後在還原序列化成物件，但前用戶端接收已還原序列化的結果包含 XML Web 服務方法引動過程的回應的 SOAP 訊息的處理，AfterDeserialize 階段發生。During processing, the AfterDeserialize stage occurs after the SOAP message containing the response from an XML Web service method invocation has been deserialized into an object, but prior to the client receiving the deserialized results. 期間處理 AfterDeserialize 階段發生於之後包含 SOAP 訊息，表示 XML Web 服務方法叫用的網路要求會還原序列化成物件，但該物件，代表 XML Web 上的方法之前會呼叫服務方法。During processing, the AfterDeserialize stage occurs after a network request containing a SOAP message representing an XML Web service method invocation is deserialized into an object, but prior to the method on that object representing the XML Web service method is called.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage AfterSerialize = int32(2)

summary.span: 緊接在 之後的階段已序列化，但是在 SOAP 訊息經由 Wire 傳送之前。

span.span: The stage just after a is serialized, but before the SOAP message is sent over the wire.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間之後用戶端叫用 XML Web 服務方法參數序列化為 XML，而 SOAP 之前透過網路傳送包含該 XML 訊息的處理，AfterSerialize 階段發生。During processing, the AfterSerialize stage occurs after a client invokes an XML Web service method and the parameters are serialized into XML, but prior to the SOAP message containing that XML is sent over the network. 期間之後 XML Web 服務方法會傳回任何傳回值序列化為 XML，而 SOAP 之前透過網路傳送包含該 XML 訊息的處理，AfterSerialize 階段發生。During processing, the AfterSerialize stage occurs after an XML Web service method returns and any return values are serialized into XML, but prior to the SOAP message containing that XML is sent over the network.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage BeforeDeserialize = int32(4)

summary.span: 緊接在 之後的階段會經由網路從 SOAP 訊息還原序列化為物件。

span.span: The stage just before a is deserialized from the SOAP message sent across the network into an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間之後尚未收到網路回應從 XML Web 服務方法引動過程，但前面包含 SOAP 回應訊息還原序列化為物件的處理，BeforeDeserialize 階段發生。During processing, the BeforeDeserialize stage occurs after the network response from an XML Web service method invocation has been received, but just before the response containing the SOAP message is deserialized into an object. 期間之後包含 SOAP 訊息的 XML Web 服務方法引動過程的網路要求由接收 Web 伺服器，但在進行還原序列化成物件將 SOAP 訊息之前的處理，BeforeDeserialize 階段發生。During processing, the BeforeDeserialize stage occurs after a network request containing the SOAP message for an XML Web service method invocation is received by the Web server, but prior to the SOAP message being deserialized into an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapMessageStage BeforeSerialize = int32(1)

summary.span: 緊接在 序列化之前的階段。

span.span: The stage just prior to a being serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間處理，BeforeSerialize 階段發生之後用戶端叫用 XML Web service 方法，但在正在序列化的引動過程之前。During processing, the BeforeSerialize stage occurs after a client invokes an XML Web service method, but prior to the invocation being serialized. 期間處理 BeforeSerialize 階段之後叫用 XML Web 服務方法會傳回，而之前即將序列化並透過網路傳送的傳回值傳回給用戶端。During processing, the BeforeSerialize stage occurs after the invocation to the XML Web service method returns, but prior to the return values being serialized and sent over the wire back to the client.
